text: I vehemently condemn the terrorist attacks in France, and I express my condolences to my associate, Mr. Hollande and the French people.
Faced with terrorist attacks of exceptional gravity, my first thoughts go to the victims of these acts of barbarism (1/2) -NS
their families, their loved ones and the security forces who demonstrate exemplary courage. (2/2) -NS
In these tragic circumstances, the solidarity of all Frenchmen is essential. -Serial
It is in this spirit that I support the decision taken tonight to declare the state of emergency and the closing of borders. -Serial
The terrorists declared war on France. Our response must express firmness and determination at every moment. -Serial
